question: Will Isaiah Thomas be signed by an NBA team?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Isaiah Thomas signs to an active NBA team's roster beyond his current 10-day contract with the Phoenix Suns by April 15, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Thomas is designated as a ‘Two-way’ payer, signs another 10-day contact or Exhibit 10 Contract this will qualify for a “Yes” resolution. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NBA, Isaiah Thomas, or the signing team. However, a consensus of credible sources will also be used to determine the outcome.

events.title: Will Isaiah Thomas be signed by an NBA team?
events.description:

If Thomas is designated as a ‘Two-way’ payer, or signs another 10 day contact, or Exhibit 10 Contract this will qualify for a “Yes” resolution. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NBA, Isaiah Thomas, or the signing team. However, a consensus of credible sources will also be used to determine the outcome.

question: Feds raid Jay-Z in March?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if any property owned by Shawn Corey Carter, a.k.a. Jay-Z, is raided by U.S. law enforcement by March 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

This encompasses any actions taken by any U.S. law enforcement including police and federal agencies to search properties owned by Jay-Z. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from government or law enforcement agencies. However, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Diddy flees US in March?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if it is confirmed that Sean Combs (a.k.a Diddy) has left the United States for any length of time between March 25, 2024, 12:01 AM ET, and March 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

In cases where Diddy may have exited US airspace on a plane, he must be confirmed to have exited the plane in a country other than the United States for this market to resolve to "Yes".

If Diddy exits US maritime territory on a boat to international waters, this market may resolve to "Yes".

If it is not confirmed by the resolution date that P. Diddy fled the US, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Will Justin Bieber accuse Diddy of misconduct?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Justin Bieber makes any public accusations of criminal activity, sexual impropriety, or any allegations of misconduct against Sean Combs (a.k.a. Diddy) between March 25 and March 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be statements by Justin Bieber and/or his official representative(s), however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Diddy arrested in March?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if American rapper Sean Combs (a.k.a. "Diddy") is arrested between March 25, 2024, 12:00 PM ET and March 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting. However, official information from the government involved in any action against Diddy and information from Diddy's legal representatives will also be used.

question: Sex tapes at Diddy's property confirmed by April 15?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if sex tapes filmed at properties owned by Sean Combs, a.k.a. P Diddy, are made public between March 26 and April 15, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, or if U.S. law enforcement agencies officially acknowledge the existence of sex tapes during their investigations by April 15, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Qualifying "sex tapes" must be video footage recorded at properties owned by Diddy depicting sexual acts directly involving the genitals of any individual(s) shown. The video must be authentic, not animated or AI-altered.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from law enforcement agencies or publicly released video. However, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: NCAAB: Arizona Wildcats vs. Clemson Tigers 2024-03-28
description:
In the upcoming NCAAB game, scheduled for March 28 at 7:09 PM ET:

If the Arizona Wildcats win, the market will resolve to “Arizona”.

If the Clemson Tigers win, the market will resolve to “Clemson”.

If the game is not completed by April 10, 2024 (11:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Ethena token FDV less than 5 billion one day after launch?
description:
On March 27 Ethena (ENA) announced the upcoming end of their pre-token "Ethena Shard Campaign" and the upcoming launch of their token (see https://mirror.xyz/0xF99d0E4E3435cc9C9868D1C6274DfaB3e2721341/uCBp9VeuLWs-ul1b6AOUAoMg5HBB_iizMIi-11N6nT8).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Fully Diluted Valuation of Ethena's token $ENA is less than $5,000,000,000 1 day after its first community airdrop. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

"1 day after its first community airdrop" is defined as 24 hours after the first community airdrop starts. The resolution source for this market is the most liquid price source available. If Ethena (NA) doesn't airdrop by December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes."

events.title: Ethena market cap (FDV) one day after launch?

question: $DJT market cap less than $8b on April 5?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the market cap of Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. (DJT) is less than $8 billion as of market close on April 5, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The market capitalization of Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. will be determined by checking Google Finance’s  “Market Cap” metric for DJT at the time of market close for April 5, 2024 (website: https://www.google.com/finance/quote/DJT:NASDAQ). 

If Google Finance’s market cap data for DJT is not available by April 5, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible source for market capitalization on April 5, market close, will be used to resolve this market.
